summary: A B-horror movie actress is stalked by a deranged fan bent on claiming her for himself.
cast: Debbie Rochon|Grant Kramer|John Mowod|Dawn Michelucci|Savannah Calhoun|Marilyn Eastman|Julie Wallace Deklavon|Christopher Boyle|Terri Lewandowski|Ed Lewandowski|Amanda Madison|Lisa Delien|Sue Ellen White|Karl Hardman|Mary Beth Boyle|S. William Hinzman|Terry Weston|Don Crotsley|Jack Smith|Diana Michelucci|Bobby Michelucci|Mary Lou Russo|Julia Ann Russo|Robert V. Michelucci|John A. Russo
director: Director: John A. Russo (as John Russo)
title: Santa Claws
